name: Hard Life (itch)
description:
What you are? A Square? A yellow Square? I don't know, but it's time to kick some ass!

This is Hard Life, watch out with the Red Square, you need to kill all of them, but you will make this of the right form?

See on Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/hardlife/336817

Buttons:

Arrows: Walk
Z: Shoot/Confirm
ESC: Quit
F4: Fullscreen

(Game under development)
